text: 'aqsm allah baltyn walzytwn, wahuma min althimar almshhwrt, waqsm bjbl "twr syna'" aldhy kllam allah ealayh musaa tklymana, waqsm bhdha albalad al'amin min kuli khawf wahu "mk" mhbt al'islam. laqad khalaqna al'iinsan fi 'ahsan swrt, thuma radadnah 'iilaa alnaar 'iin lam yutie allh, wayatabie alrsl, lkn aladhin amanuu waeamiluu al'aemal alsalht lahum 'ajr eazim ghyr maqtue wala mnqws
